parameters.name: DatasetName
parameters.description: The name of the dataset. You can obtain the name of the dataset from the response of the [CreateDataset](~~478160~~) operation.

parameters.name: ProjectName
parameters.description: The name of the project. You can obtain the name of the project from the response of the [CreateProject](~~478153~~) operation.

parameters.name: URI
parameters.description:
The URI of the OSS bucket to which you bind the dataset.

Specify the value in the oss://${Bucket} format. `${Bucket}` specifies the name of the OSS bucket that resides in the same region as the current project.
